display_long_description:
**Travel the World, Take Language Lessons, and Explore Cultures with Dynamic Languages**

Dynamic Languages is a VR Language Learning App with **Lessons** & **Trips**

Visit Japan, Spain, France, Italy, Germany, and the UK in On-Demand 360 Video Trips with Quizzes & Games.

[media]

Immerse Yourself in Guided Tours Around Fascinating Sites and Breathtaking Landscapes, Learning About History, Culture, and More.

Discover Landmarks, Traditions, and Festivals in Multilingual Immersive Media Experiences.

Feel Like You’re on Holiday, Soaking up the Sights and Sounds.

[media]

**LESSONS**

Speak Spanish and Japanese in VR with On-Demand Beginner Lessons with Enthusiastic World Class Teachers!

Conquer your Fear of Speaking Through Simulated Interactions with Real People in 360 Video Encounters.

Use Speech Recognition to Improve Your Pronunciation and Progress Through the Interactions.

[media]

**LIVE CONTENT:**
- 40 Japanese Lessons & Conversations (JPLT N5)
- 5 Spanish Lessons & Conversations (CEFR A1)
- 25 Trips to Japan (JPLT N2/3)
- 50+ Trips to Spain (CEFR A2-C2)
- 50+ Trips to Britain (CEFR A2-C2)
- 20+ French, German, Italian Trips (CEFR A2-C2)

**COMING SOON**
- English Conversations
- More Trips (CEFR A2-C2)
- Korean Lessons

**OUTSIDE OF VR:**
- Worksheets & Transcripts
- How to Learn Video Series
- Discord Community

Subscription-Based Media App with Free Demo.

Suitable for Solo Learners and Groups (Schools, Colleges, Businesses, etc).
